Actions.Template:
<#ftl output_format="XML">
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE topic PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DITA Topic//EN" "topic.dtd">
<topic id="uml-${dataClass.id}" audience="diagrams">
    <title>UML Diagram</title>
    <body>
        
            <fig frame="all" expanse="page">
                <title>Diagram of ${dataClass.label} and related classes</title>
                <image href="ClassDiagram_${dataClass.dataModel.label?url_path('utf-8')}%20-%20${dataClass.label?url_path('utf-8')}.dot.svg">
                    <alt>Diagram of ${dataClass.label} and related classes</alt>
                </image>
            </fig>
    
    </body>
</topic>
Actions.Name: Topic to contain a diagram

Actions.Template:
<#macro drawChildren class>
// Children of ${class.label!"Unknown class"}
    <#list class.childDataClasses as related>
        "${class.id}" -- "${related.id}" [
                arrowhead = "none"
                headlabel = "<@multiplicity class />"
                taillabel = "<@multiplicity related />"
        ]
        <@drawClass related />
    </#list>
</#macro>
<#macro drawClass class>
// class ${class.label!"Unknown class"}
        "${class.id}" [
                label = "{${class.label!"Unknown class"}|
                <#list class.childDataElements as dataElement>
                + ${dataElement.label} : ${dataElement.dataType.label!"Missing datatype"} [<@multiplicity dataElement />]\l
                </#list>
                }"
        ]
</#macro>
<#macro multiplicity object>
<#if object.minMultiplicity??>
<#if object.minMultiplicity == object.maxMultiplicity>${object.minMultiplicity}<#else>${object.minMultiplicity}..<#if object.maxMultiplicity==-1>*<#else>${object.maxMultiplicity!"?"}</#if></#if></#if>
</#macro>
<#macro relatedClasses dataClass>
${dataClass.label} 
<#list dataClass.childDataElements?filter(p -> p.dataType.domainType == "ReferenceType") as dataElement >
       ${dataClass.label} ${dataElement.label}  ${dataElement.dataType.label} ${dataElement.dataType.referenceClass.label}
</#list>
</#macro>

graph G {
        node [
            shape = "record"
        ]
        edge [
        ]
<@drawChildren dataClass />  
<@drawClass dataClass />        
      
}
Actions.Name: GraphViz UML Diagram

Actions.Template:
<#macro createLines dataClass>
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Graphviz2.38\bin\dot" -O -Tsvg "ClassDiagram_${dataClass.dataModel.label} - ${dataClass.label}.dot"
<#list dataClass.childDataClasses as dc >
<@createLines dc />
</#list>
</#macro>
Rem Batch file to generate SVG from DOT files
<#list dataModel.childDataClasses as dataClass >
<@createLines dataClass />
</#list>
Actions.Name: Batch file
